meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Forms
section.content: The forms in the Schedule shall be the prescribed forms for the purposes of section 22 of the Ordinance.

tr.td: A request for surrender having been received from
who is wanted in the said place

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is sought)

paragraph.content: for prosecution/the imposition or enforcement of a sentence* in respect of the offence/offences* of ........................................................................** I hereby order that the said person be dealt with under Part 2 of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503).

content.span: Identify the offence(s) by reference to the description of offences specified in Schedule 1

paragraph.content: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong.

tr.td: I having received an authority to proceed in respect of

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is sought by the said authority to proceed)
(name of prescribed place specified in the authority to proceed)

paragraph.content: for prosecution/the imposition or enforcement of a sentence* in respect of the offence/offences* of ....................................................................** [and being satisfied that section 15 of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503) would not be contravened if the said person were brought before the court of committal***].
YOU ARE HEREBY COMMANDED to arrest the said person forthwith and as soon as practicable to bring the said person before the court of committal.

content.span: Recite description of offence(s) in the authority to proceed.
Delete the words in square brackets if the person whose surrender is sought is not liable to serve a sentence of imprisonment in Hong Kong.

paragraph.content: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong.

tr.td: I being satisfied by information given on oath that
..................... is or is believed to be in or on his way to Hong Kong and is

paragraph.content: for prosecution/the imposition or enforcement of a sentence* in respect of the offence/offences* of ...................................................................** [and being satisfied that section 15 of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503) would not be contravened if the said person were brought before the court of committal***].
YOU ARE HEREBY COMMANDED to arrest the said person forthwith and as soon as practicable to bring the said person before the court of committal.

content.span: Identify the offence(s) by reference to the description of offences specified in Schedule 1 to the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503).
Delete the words in square brackets if the person who is wanted is not liable to serve a sentence of imprisonment in Hong Kong.

p.span: Order for Cancellation of Provisional Warrant of Arrest

paragraph.content: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong and to the Commissioner of Correctional Services.
Pursuant to section 7(2)(b) of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503), I hereby order—

tr.td: the cancellation of the provisional warrant of arrest dated .................................. 19........ issued in respect of
the discharge of that person from custody if he has been arrested pursuant to such warrant*.

content.span: Delete paragraph (b) if the arrested person is liable to serve a sentence of imprisonment in Hong Kong.

tr.td: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong.
I being satisfied by information on oath that there are reasonable grounds for suspecting that there is likely to be found in

[may be material as evidence in proving an offence to which a request for surrender has been received in respect of ..........
.............................................................................................. ;]

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is sought)

tr.td: [may be material as evidence in proving an offence to which the request for surrender in respect of

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is to be sought)

tr.td: I am satisfied will be received;]

[has been acquired as the result of an offence to which a request for surrender has been received in respect of ........................................................................................................... ;]

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is sought)

tr.td: [has been acquired as the result of an offence to which the request for surrender in respect of

td.span: (name of person whose surrender is to be sought)

tr.td: in respect of which I am satisfied will be received]*.
YOU ARE HEREBY COMMANDED, with such assistants as may be necessary, at any time to enter the said place, by force if necessary, and there search for and seize the said property.
To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong and to the Commissioner of Correctional Services.
Pursuant to section 10(6)(a)/10(6)(b)* of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503), I hereby order
in respect of the following offence/offences*—

to await the Chief Executive’s decision as to his surrender, in respect of that offence/1 or more of those offences*, to the prescribed place by which the request for surrender in respect of such person was made; and
if the Chief Executive decides that he shall be surrendered to that place, to await such surrender.

content.span: Identify the offence(s) by reference to the Hong Kong offence(s) falling within the description of offences specified in Schedule 1 to the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503).
Delete or add nos. as necessary to provide for offence(s).

paragraph.content: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong, to the Commissioner of Correctional Services and to the escort officer of ...........

tr.td: Pursuant to section 13(1) of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503), I hereby order that

paragraph.content: in respect of the following offence/offences*—
Given under my hand and the Public Seal of Hong Kong this day of 19 in Hong Kong.

content.span: Identify the offence(s) by reciting the relevant wording used in the order of committal concerned.
Delete or add nos. as necessary to provide for offence(s).

tr.td: Pursuant to section 19(1)(i) of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503), I hereby order that

td.content: shall, instead of continuing to be kept in custody for a period of 30 days as specified in that section, continue to be kept in custody for the shorter period of ..................... days.

p.span:
Order Authorizing Authorized Officer to Hold
in Custody a Person being Transported
in Custody through Hong Kong

paragraph.content: To each and all of the authorized officers of Hong Kong.

tr.td: Pursuant to section 20(2) of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance (Cap. 503), I hereby authorize any authorized officer to hold

td.p: in custody for a further period of .......................... hours/days* after the expiration of the period of 48 hours referred to in that section.
